E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Ruben Amaro Jr.
Dear Sir,
Ruben Amaro Jr. is hitting the ball well at AA Canton-Akron Indians!
He has an AVG of .314, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Troy Neel
Dear Sir,

He has an AVG of .280 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
